mapper.select: SELECT ctr.id as credit_transaction_id, transaction_type_id as credit_transaction_type_id, transaction_date, credit_amount, ctr.status, comments, ctr.user_id, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, ctt.id as transaction_type_id, ctt.description, ctt.transaction_type_code, ctt.user_description, ctt.transaction_sign, us.user_id, us.nickname, us.email_address, us.status, us.first_name, us.last_name FROM credit_transactions as ctr, credit_transaction_types as ctt, users as us WHERE ctr.transaction_type_id = ctt.id and ctr.user_id = us.user_id and ctr.status = 0;

SELECT ctr.id as credit_transaction_id, transaction_type_id as credit_transaction_type_id, transaction_date, credit_amount, status, comments, user_id, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, ctt.id as transaction_type_id, ctt.description, ctt.transaction_type_code, ctt.user_description, ctt.transaction_sign FROM credit_transactions as ctr, credit_transaction_types as ctt WHERE ctr.transaction_type_id = ctt.id and user_id = #{userId}
